author: .vbuterin
content: BTW I want to suggest that we rename this channel "sharding". The latest roadmap implies no necessary order between light client support, sharding and the merge so calling them phases is misleading

author: ryg9705
content: <@!273808422753796097> Can you explain why there is no order in which things need to happen? I thought that "The merge" implies that ETH1 is moved into a shard, which would imply that sharding needs to be deployed before that.

author: m.kalinin
content: <@!134118181710200833> Embedding Eth1 execution into the Beacon Chain is another way to merge Eth1 into Eth2. We're actively evaluating it at the moment. This approach removes the dependency on shards.

author: .vbuterin
content: And the "shards are just data" approach makes that a more natural choice
